p: In addition, DiCaprio claimed that 2015 was the hottest year on record and indigenous populations will be disproportionately affected by climate change. Google queries including the terms “hottest year” or “indigenous” spiked immediately yielding 342% (95%CI: 248–433) and 81% (95%CI: 53–109) more searches than expected the first day following the speech, and remained elevated for 2 and 3 more days, respectively. During the same period, queries for climate change topics not mentioned by DiCaprio, such as “electric cars,” did not deviate from their historical trends.
